analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Naparittaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca mahaggato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na parittam na hetum dhammam paṭicca mahaggataḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekādasa, ārammaṇe ekādasa, adhipatiyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane nava …pe… avigate ekādasa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekādasa ārammaṇe ekādasa adhipatiyā nava pe purejāte āsevane nava pe avigate ekādasa

original: Naparittārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parittārammaṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na paritta ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca paritta ārammaṇaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe terasa, adhipatiyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane nava …pe… avigate terasa.
analyzed: hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe terasa adhipatiyā nava pe purejāte āsevane nava pe avigate terasa
